data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,388,489 who are far from you in Luoyang, Henan, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Luoyang, Henan, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Luoyang hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Luoyang, Henan, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 116,007 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 116,007 believers in Luoyang, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Luoyang do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Luoyang, Henan, China by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Luoyang
location.cities_list: Luoyang, Checun, Mengjin Chengguanzhen, Yanshi Chengguanzhen, Song Xian Chengguanzhen
location.cities_list_w_pop: Luoyang (1,390,581), Checun, Mengjin Chengguanzhen, Yanshi Chengguanzhen, Song Xian Chengguanzhen
